items.title: Archeological Survey of India
items.description: We implemented a configurable multi-monument ticket booking platform that was designed to perform under stress. In process we were able to identify areas for improvement and implement changes to increase efficiency and revenue.

items.title: Guru Kashi University
items.description: Implemented a university management solution that included modules for student information, course scheduling, faculty information, and financial management.

items.title: HRMS
items.description: Replaced the legacy system with user-friendly, customizable, and scalable Aqua Teams which met the organization's needs of growing workforce

items.title: Servana
items.description: Using AppLegos platform, we developed an end to RFQ and Bid management solution that connected Healthcare providers to Service providers.

items.title: Opos
items.description: Analyze patient activities, supervise appointments, and generate medical reports efficiently with our time-bound app.

items.title: AQUA Teams
items.description: Cloud-based AQUA: Time tracking, Attendance Management, Payroll processing with biometrics, mobile app, and SSID location.
